description: A doctor in Dagestan reveals how colleagues in his town died as the virus spread.
title: Coronavirus: Russian republic Dagestan enduring a 'catastrophe'
title_page: Coronavirus: Russian republic Dagestan enduring a 'catastrophe' - BBC News
maintext: "Of course we expected more from the Dagestani government, but I don't want to criticise anyone," the village head reflects. "At the start we had nothing: no PPE, no medicine. We hoped the virus wouldn't affect our village," he admits.
